name: Gravitree (Habetis Invalidum)
description: Hello everyone yes i made another game. This one surprisingly wasnt made for a game jam. I made it cuz why not. In order to get inspiration to make this game i used  a random game idea generator(this one:) and i got the idea "Gravity-based bonsai game" so thats what i made. The more score you rack up the more your Gravitree will grow! Towards the end of the score prizes youll find some references to my other 2 games, For Now, and MixumUp. Having fun reaching the max of 300 points(so far(more score prizes may be added in the future))
